array.string: Tape, polystyrene & plastic inserts need to be removed.
Glitter, badges & batteries should be removed from greeting cards.
Egg boxes & cardboard rolls (e.g. from toilet rolls) can be home composted.
Any plastic wrapping should be removed.
Stamps can also be recycled.
Tape, polystyrene & plastic inserts need to be removed.
Glitter, badges & batteries should be removed from greeting cards.
Egg boxes & cardboard rolls (e.g. from toilet rolls) can be home composted.
Any plastic wrapping should be removed.
Stamps can also be recycled.
Rinse or wipe off any crumbs or food residue.
Scrunch foil, wrappers and tub / pot lids to form a ball.
Empty and rinse.
Leave on labels.
Replace lids and tops.
Squash to save space.
Straws & Black Plastic are not recyclable.
Plastic bags can go to supermarket collection points.

Put lids and caps back on.
Corks should be removed from bottles.
